Title: The Mountain
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Jesse Moynihan, Sam Alden, Kent Osborne (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Jesse Moynihan (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: Dee Bradley Baker, Jim Cummings, Jessica DiCicco, John DiMaggio
Plot: Feeling unfulfilled, both Lemongrab and Finn take an introspective journey into the Mountain of Matthew. Inside, they are faced with their desires, their fears and themselves, and must make a pivotal choice.
